challenges.title: Your Speaking Challenges
challenges.noChallenges: Based on your responses, you don't seem to have major speaking challenges. However, everyone can improve their speaking skills with practice.

regularPractice.title: Regular Speaking Practice
regularPractice.description: Set aside at least 15-30 minutes daily for speaking practice, even if it's just talking to yourself.

confidence.title: Confidence Building
confidence.description: Start with low-pressure speaking situations. Use AI conversation partners to practice without judgment.

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary Expansion
vocabulary.description: Focus on learning high-frequency conversational words and phrases rather than general vocabulary.

pronunciation.title: Pronunciation Practice
pronunciation.description: Use speech recognition tools to get feedback on your pronunciation. Record yourself speaking and compare with native speakers.

grammar.title: Practical Grammar
grammar.description: Focus on using grammar in real conversations rather than memorizing rules. Practice forming sentences quickly while speaking.

fluency.title: Fluency Development
fluency.description: Practice speaking without pausing. Try shadowing exercises where you repeat what a native speaker says in real-time.

comprehension.title: Listening Comprehension
comprehension.description: Improve your ability to understand native speakers through active listening practice with podcasts, videos, and conversations.

travel.title: Travel Conversation Practice
travel.description: Focus on practical travel situations like ordering food, asking for directions, and handling transportation.

work.title: Professional Speaking Skills
work.description: Practice vocabulary and phrases specific to your industry. Work on formal presentation skills.

weeklyPlan.title: Weekly Practice Plan
weeklyPlan.description: Consistent practice is key to improving speaking skills. Here's a suggested weekly schedule:

confidence.title: Building Confidence
tips: Start with short, scripted conversations
Practice with AI conversation partners before real people
Record yourself speaking and listen back
Join language exchange groups with supportive members
Celebrate small wins and progress

vocabulary.title: Expanding Conversational Vocabulary
tips: Learn vocabulary in context through dialogues
Focus on high-frequency words used in conversation
Practice using new words in sentences immediately
Create vocabulary clusters around conversation topics
Use spaced repetition to review vocabulary regularly

pronunciation.title: Improving Pronunciation
tips: Focus on sounds that don't exist in your native language
Practice minimal pairs to distinguish similar sounds
Record yourself and compare with native speakers
Use speech recognition tools for feedback
Learn the rhythm and intonation patterns of the language

fluency.title: Developing Fluency
tips: Practice speaking without pausing, even if you make mistakes
Try shadowing exercises with native audio
Learn common filler words and conversation connectors
Practice describing everyday objects and activities
Set a timer and speak continuously for increasing periods

items.question: How do I download the app?
items.answer: You can download our app from the App Store for iOS devices or from Google Play Store for Android devices. Simply click on the respective download buttons above.

items.question: Is the app free to download?
items.answer: Yes, the basic version of our app is free to download. We offer premium features through in-app purchases.

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: Our app currently supports 10 languages including Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Chinese (Mandarin), Korean, Russian, and Arabic.

items.question: How does the QR code work?
items.answer: Scan the QR code with your phone's camera app. This will take you directly to the app download page on your device's app store.

items.question: Can I use the app offline?
items.answer: Some features of our app are available offline, but for the full experience including AI conversation practice, an internet connection is required.
